Upkeep: -10% for Skeleton Warriors and Skeleton Spearmen

skillTree.name: Barded Nightmare
skillTree.description: The most impressive Nightmares are those reared on fresh blood. Such noble monstrosities are worthy mounts.

effects.description: Winds of Magic cost: -1 for "Raise Dead"
Winds of Magic cost: -1 for "Raise Dead Upgraded"

ui_effects.description: Units won't regenerate if cap was reached

effects.description: Spell number of uses: +2 for "Raise Dead" and "Raise Dead Upgraded"

skillTree.name: Aura of Dark Majesty
skillTree.description: This Lord of Undeath projects an aura of dominion that can wilt the most iron-willed mortals.

skillTree.name: Dark Pact
skillTree.description: A dark pact has been made with darker Gods to guarantee victory.

skillTree.name: Grave Ward
skillTree.description: Whereby the power of death itself is used to hold back the physical world.

skillTree.name: Eternal Bastion
skillTree.description: Strengthened by the ages and Kemmler's necromancy, Krell's Chaos-infused plate armour protects him from degrading as other bound-entities eventually must do.

effects.description: Krell no longer degrades in battle

skillTree.name: Perpetual Regeneration
skillTree.description: Life without end; destruction without pause. Excellent!

effects.description: Passive ability: "Horrible Regeneration" for Hexwraiths, Cairn Wraiths and Spirit Hosts units (Rank 7 and above)

ui_effects.description: Units won't regenerate if cap was reached

skillTree.name: Barrow Kings
skillTree.description: Necromancy without peer; reanimation worthy of a king.

effects.description: Hero action success chance: +10% for Wight Kings

skillTree.name: Seeker of Secrets
skillTree.description: Kemmler does not hesitate to plunder barrows, pillage tombs, or desecrate ancient halls in his pursuit of knowledge.

effects.description: Post battle chance of stealing a magic item: +15%

skillTree.name: Wightblades
skillTree.description: Accursed relics from ancient barrows cleave the soul as easily as they part the flesh.

effects.description: Passive ability: "Wightblades" for Hexwraiths, Cairn Wraiths and Spirit Hosts units (Rank 7 and above)
Bonus vs Infantry: +8 for Hexwraiths, Cairn Wraiths and Spirit Hosts units

skillTree.name: Return of the Lichemaster
skillTree.description: "What greater prospect do I have in Nagash's service – a future of mindless servitude in an unchanging world? The Great Necromancer is a selfish child."

effects.description: Recruit rank: +2 for Hexwraiths, Cairn Wraiths and Spirit Hosts units

ui_effects.description: ➕ Improves power recharge rate by 1 every 20 seconds

skillTree.name: Lord of the Scourge
skillTree.description: "And I'll lead you all in the dance," said he - the relentless dance of the tireless Undead hordes.

effects.description: Attrition: -5% casualties suffered from all attrition
Attrition: -10% casualties suffered from all attrition

skillTree.name: Thrall Master
skillTree.description: "Come to my side, my Undead servants. Now, you are bound, irrevocably, to my will forever!"

effects.description: Recruit rank: +2 for Skeletal and Zombie units
Recruit rank: +4 for Skeletal and Zombie units

skillTree.name: Earthing
skillTree.description: By stabbing a staff or some arcane conduit into the ground, an accomplished magic-user can earth or tether the Winds and hopefully reduce a chance of miscasting.

skillTree.name: Magical Reserves
skillTree.description: A few magic-users have the ability to store the Winds of Magic for later use, increasing their spellcasting power when it really counts.

skillTree.name: Loremaster, Lore of Vampires
skillTree.description: This one is no apprentice in the black arts but a master of Necromancy and Dark Magic.

effects.description: Cooldown: -25% to Lore of Vampires spells

ui_effects.description: Units won't regenerate if cap was reached

skillTree.name: Dark Shepherd
skillTree.description: In a land saturated with blood, there are always fallen sheep ready to serve.

skillTree.name: Skeletal Minions
skillTree.description: This one maintains a large host of lowly skeletons.

effects.description: Upkeep: -10% for Skeleton Warriors and Skeleton Spearmen

skillTree.name: Carrion Swarms
skillTree.description: Carrion follow this army, eager for fresh food.

effects.description: Campaign movement range: -10% for enemy armies starting their turn in this province

skillTree.name: Student of the Dark Arts
skillTree.description: Learning to master Dark Magic is a long, difficult road. This one has taken the first steps.

skillTree.name: Aura of Supremacy
skillTree.description: "I am mighty, none dare challenge me!"

skillTree.name: The Unliving Host
skillTree.description: "Arise my host, my Unliving minions - bring me victory!"

effects.description: Melee attack: +2 for Zombies, Skeletons, Crypt Ghouls and Grave Guard units

Melee defence: +6 for Zombies, Skeletons, Crypt Ghouls and Grave Guard units

skillTree.name: Call of the Night
skillTree.description: "Can you hear it… the call of the night? Time for its children to arise and swarm."

Speed: +5% for Fell Bats and Dire Wolves units

skillTree.name: Evil Souls
skillTree.description: Such evil spirits are desperate to spill mortal blood, and will speed along until they find some flesh to carve.

skillTree.name: Creatures of the Night
skillTree.description: The Lord howls out into the night, and is answered by the baying of dark creatures.

effects.description: Charge bonus: +5 for Crypt Horrors, Vargheists, Varghulfs, Zombie Dragon and Terrorgheist units

skillTree.name: Waking Dead
skillTree.description: Vampires summon forth the gruesome remains of the ancient dead to bolster the masses of lesser minions under their control.

effects.description: Melee attack: +2 for Black Knights, Blood Dragon Warriors and Blood Knights units
Armour: +6 for Black Knights, Blood Dragon Warriors and Blood Knights units
Melee attack: +4 for Black Knights, Blood Dragon Warriors and Blood Knights units
Armour: +12 for Black Knights, Blood Dragon Warriors and Blood Knights units
Melee attack: +6 for Black Knights, Blood Dragon Warriors and Blood Knights units

skillTree.name: Carriages of Death
skillTree.description: By their very nature, most Vampires try to avoid discomfort and travel in style.

Charge bonus: +5 for Black Coach, Corpse Cart and Mortis Engine units

skillTree.name: Legions of Dead
skillTree.description: "…and the legions of the dead envoked all hell upon the world."

effects.description: Weapon strength: +10% for Zombies, Skeletons, Grave Guard, Cairn Wraiths and Spirit Hosts units (Rank 7 and above)
Melee attack: +5 for Zombies, Skeletons, Grave Guard, Cairn Wraiths and Spirit Hosts units (Rank 7 and above)
Magic resistance: 15% for Zombies, Skeletons, Grave Guard, Cairn Wraiths and Spirit Hosts units (Rank 7 and above)

skillTree.name: Dread Knights
skillTree.description: The Undead Lord has followed the warrior's path to its ultimate conclusion, in a dark mockery of a Knight's vow.

effects.description: Ward save: 5% for Black Coach, Black Knights, Blood Dragon Warriors, Blood Knights, Corpse Cart, Hexwraiths and Mortis Engine units (Rank 7 and above)
Weapon strength: +10% for Black Coach, Black Knights, Blood Dragon Warriors, Blood Knights, Corpse Cart, Hexwraiths and Mortis Engine units (Rank 7 and above)
Charge bonus: +15 for Black Coach, Black Knights, Blood Dragon Warriors, Blood Knights, Corpse Cart, Hexwraiths and Mortis Engine units (Rank 7 and above)

skillTree.name: Deadly Power
skillTree.description: The power of death cannot be denied.

effects.description: Weapon strength: +10% for Crypt Ghouls, Crypt Horrors, Dire Wolves and Varghulfs units (Rank 7 and above)
Melee attack: +5 for Crypt Ghouls, Crypt Horrors, Dire Wolves and Varghulfs units (Rank 7 and above)
Physical resistance: 10% for Crypt Ghouls, Crypt Horrors, Dire Wolves and Varghulfs units (Rank 7 and above)

skillTree.name: Flying Horrors
skillTree.description: The Dark Magic-user can take to the skies, defying gravity by metamorphosing into a bat.

effects.description: Missile resistance: +15% for Fell Bats, Zombie Dragon, Terrorgheist and Vargheists units (Rank 7 and above)
Melee attack: +5 for Fell Bats, Zombie Dragon, Terrorgheist and Vargheists units (Rank 7 and above)
Charge bonus: +15 for Fell Bats, Zombie Dragon, Terrorgheist and Vargheists units (Rank 7 and above)

skillTree.name: The Restless Dead
skillTree.description: A Lord of Necromancy's minions do not suffer exhaustion, they can walk for leagues and never suffer.

skillTree.name: Undying Horde
skillTree.description: Once slain in battle, the foe belongs to the Undead Lord, and will rise again, eager to serve.

skillTree.name: Children of the Night
skillTree.description: A powerful, vigorous Lord of Darkness will see the Children of the Night gather unto them.

skillTree.name: Darkling Skies
skillTree.description: The sun is no ally of the dead - a sky scorched black, or darkest night, will invigorate the Unliving.

effects.description: Attrition: -3% casualties suffered from all attrition
Attrition: -8% casualties suffered from all attrition
Attrition: -15% casualties suffered from all attrition

skillTree.name: Ancient Cunning
skillTree.description: Such long-lived creatures develop a level of guile that mortals cannot match.

skillTree.name: Immortal Horror
skillTree.description: Such a beast is all but impossible to destroy - an immortal horror doomed to haunt eternity!

skillTree.name: Lightning Strike
skillTree.description: "The time to strike is now!"

effects.description: Enables lightning strike battles when reinforcements are present

skillTree.name: Guile & Glamour
skillTree.description: A simple glamour can disguise a monstrous Vampire or Liche, so they may then charm and beguile the local populace.

skillTree.name: Necrarch
skillTree.description: W'soran's scions are masters at the art of Necromancy, to dabble in such will be a boon.

skillTree.name: Eternal Warden
skillTree.description: This Lord has endless forbearance, a timeless patience crafted over millennia.

skillTree.name: Uncanny Prescience
skillTree.description: This Lord can hear the thoughts of mortals for leagues around, and plan accordingly.

effects.description: Hero self-defence: +10% chance of wounding aggressors

skillTree.name: Maintenance
skillTree.description: FACTIONWIDE: all source of income: -0,5% and characters upkeep: +1%. Effects are additive. Negated on level 30 of character.

skillTree.name: Wanderer
skillTree.description: "You and your masters are desiccated relics of a dead age."

effects.description: All units in Heinrich Kemmler's army are immune to non-Vampire Count territory attrition
Cooldown: -20% to Lore of Vampires spells
Winds of Magic cost: -20% for Lore of Vampires
Weapon strength: +20% for Skeleton Warriors and Skeleton Spearmen
